item.description:
Come join us for a Midsummer Solstice Celebration to honor our connection with Mother Earth...

This celebration will include the traditional decorating of the Midsummer tree, an awesome
not-to-miss class on Traditional Tibetan prayer flags, the history, meanings and how to make your own- given by Tony, the Midsummer ritual, Prayer Flag ceremony, Battle of the Oak & Holly King, Pot Luck Feast, Wicker man ceremony, bonfire with drumming and chanting, and the showing of the movie
Avatar.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Tentative Schedule of Events is as follows:

2:00- 3:00 Appetizers- Decorating of the Midsummer Tree
(We need people to help with this!! :)

3:00- 3:30 Prayer Flag Class: History, Meanings, and how to make your own (Tony)

3:30- 4:30 Preparation for Ritual- Pre- Ritual Discussion

4:30- 5:30 Midsummer Ritual

5:30- 6:00 Traditional Prayer Flag Ceremony

6:00- 6:30 Battle of the Oak & Holly King

7:00- 8:00 Pot Luck Feast

8:00 Bonfire- Wicker Man Ceremony- Drumming & Chanting

10:00 Showing of the movie Avatar (for those interested)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

SOME IMPORTANT INFORMATION:

~This event is BYOB

~Food will be pot luck, sign up sheet will be sent to the list prior to the event

~Overnight camping is available, please let me know if you are planning on doing this, or
if you need to stay in the house

~Children are welcome as long as there is a responsible adult outside the circle in case young children get fussy

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
item.name: Midsummer Solstice Celebration-"Tribute to GAIA"
